title.rendered: The Vine Rant: The Insider Scoop on what’s happening in the Insured Mortgage World

content.rendered: Courtney Kencher, Account Manager at Genworth Canada, shares some insights and how the COVID-19 pandemic has impacted the Insured Mortgage World.
